## Pre-Wave

### Background Variables
```{r}
Variable <- c("Label",
          "Question wording ENG", 
          "Question wording  NL")

values <- c("gender", 
         "First of all, are you a ...?",
        "Allereerst, bent u een ...")

d <- tibble(Variable = Variable, gender = values) 
d %>%
  kbl() %>%
    kable_classic_2(bootstrap_options = "striped", 
                    full_width = F, 
                    position = "center",
                    font_size = 13) %>%
    kable_styling(fixed_thead = T) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "65em")

d <- tibble(`Response Code` = c(0, 1), 
          `Response Label` = c("Male", "Female"), 
          `Response Wording` = c("Man", "Vrouw"))
d %>%
  kbl() %>%
    kable_classic_2(bootstrap_options = "striped", 
                    full_width = F, 
                    position = "center",
                    font_size = 13) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "60em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "60em")
```

### Block A: Voting Behavior

```{r}
values = c("gotv_intention", 
         "On March 17, 2021 there are parliamentary elections. Do you think you will vote then?",
         "Op 17 maart 2021 zijn er Tweede Kamerverkiezingen. Denkt u dan te gaan stemmen?")
d <- tibble(Variable = Variable, A1 = values) 
d %>%
  kbl() %>%
    kable_classic_2(bootstrap_options = "striped", 
                    full_width = F, 
                    position = "center",
                    font_size = 13) %>%
    kable_styling(fixed_thead = T) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "65em")

d <- tibble(`Response Code` = c(1,0, 998:999), 
          `Response Label` = c("Yes, I will vote", "No, I will not vote", "I don't know yet", "I'm not eligble to vote"), 
          `Response Wording` = c("Ja, ik ga stemmen", "Nee ik ga niet stemmen", "Ik weet het nog niet", "Ik mag niet stemmen"))
d %>%
  kbl() %>%
    kable_classic_2(bootstrap_options = "striped", 
                    full_width = F, 
                    position = "center",
                    font_size = 13) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "60em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "60em")
```

```{r}
d <- tibble(Variable = Variable, B1 = values)
```

### Block C: Issue Association

```{r}
values = c("Issue_association1", 
         "Political parties take positions on various subjects. We ask you what subject you think of each party's views below. Which subject comes to mind first at [party & party leader]?",
         "Politieke partijen nemen over verschillende onderwerpen standpunten in. We vragen u aan welk onderwerp u bij de standpunten van elke partij hieronder denkt. Welk onderwerp komt als eerste bij u op bij [partij & partijleider]?")
d <- tibble(Variable = Variable, C1_1 = values) 
d %>%
  kbl() %>%
    kable_classic_2(bootstrap_options = "striped", 
                    full_width = F, 
                    position = "center",
                    font_size = 13) %>%
    kable_styling(fixed_thead = T) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "65em")

d <- tibble(`Response Code` = c(1:20), 
          `Response Label` = c("Asylum seekers and migrants",
                               "Mobility and infrastructure (e.g. air traffic, road network, Netherlands distribution country)", 
                               "Administrative renewal (e.g. elected prime minister, referendums)", 
                               "Crime fighting (e.g. drug labs, threats, possession of weapons)", 
                               "European Union and Euro", 
                               "Health care (e.g. reward care, waiting lists, deductible)",
```
